* BCM43XX Bluetooth Driver
BCM43XX Bluetooth driver configure and initialize BCM43XX
bluetooth device.

Required properties:
       - compatible: Should be set to one of the following:
               brcm,btdriver
       - brcm,bt-reset-gpio: GPIO pin to bring BT Controller out of reset

Example:
       bt_driver {
               compatible = "brcm,btdriver";
               pinctrl-names = "default";
               pinctrl-0 = <&bcm_bt_en_default>;
               brcm,bt-reset-gpio = <&tlmm 21 0>;
               status = "ok";
       };
